com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups

Class KandyGroupParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups.KandyGroupParams

  • public class KandyGroupParams
extends Object
    Contains the KandyGroup params that could be updated and used for updating the group by passing parameters to the server

    • Field Detail

      • REMOVE_IMAGE

        public static final Uri REMOVE_IMAGE
        Constant that used as indicator for remove group image from the group
        sample how to be used:

        updateGroupImage(groupId, KandyGroupParams.REMOVE_IMAGE, responseListener);
